metadata.description: Forged from the discarded hoards of Aureum left by the Cipher, the Yukata is a signal to the New World to deter from repeating the mistakes of the Old. Adorned by the First Nomads and enshrined by those to come, the Yukata serves as a sigil of our cause.
metadata.long_description: Forged from the discarded hoards of Aureum left by the Cipher, the Yukata is a signal to the New World to deter from repeating the mistakes of the Old. Adorned by the First Nomads and enshrined by those to come, the Yukata serves as a sigil of our cause.
metadata.name: Aureum Yukata - The Workshop
